mapper.insert:
insert into bridge_info
bridge_info.bridge_length,
bridge_info.bridge_name,
bridge_info.bridge_no,
bridge_info.cross_hole_style,
bridge_info.direction,
bridge_info.end_miles,
bridge_info.flyover_category,
bridge_info.hole_length,
bridge_info.is_delete,
bridge_info.line_id,
bridge_info.long_chain,
bridge_info.middle_miles,
bridge_info.operator,
bridge_info.remark,
bridge_info.side,
bridge_info.start_miles,
bridge_info.status,
bridge_info.track_division_id,
bridge_info.track_weigth,
bridge_info.create_time
values
#{bridgeLength},
#{bridgeName},
#{bridgeNo},
#{crossHoleStyle},
#{direction},
#{endMiles},
#{flyoverCategory},
#{holeLength},
#{isDelete},
#{lineId},
#{longChain},
#{middleMiles},
#{operator},
#{remark},
#{side},
#{startMiles},
#{status},
#{trackDivisionId},
#{trackWeigth},
current_timestamp
mapper.update:
update bridge_info
bridge_info.bridge_length = #{BridgeLength},
bridge_info.bridge_name = #{BridgeName},
bridge_info.bridge_no = #{BridgeNo},
bridge_info.cross_hole_style = #{CrossHoleStyle},
bridge_info.direction = #{Direction},
bridge_info.end_miles = #{EndMiles},
bridge_info.flyover_category = #{FlyoverCategory},
bridge_info.hole_length = #{HoleLength},
bridge_info.is_delete = #{IsDelete},
bridge_info.line_id = #{LineId},
bridge_info.long_chain = #{LongChain},
bridge_info.middle_miles = #{MiddleMiles},
bridge_info.operator = #{Operator},
bridge_info.remark = #{Remark},
bridge_info.side = #{Side},
bridge_info.start_miles = #{StartMiles},
bridge_info.status = #{Status},
bridge_info.track_division_id = #{TrackDivisionId},
bridge_info.track_weigth = #{TrackWeigth}
bridge_info.update_time= current_timestamp
bridge_info.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select bridge_info.bridge_length, bridge_info.bridge_name, bridge_info.bridge_no, bridge_info.create_time, bridge_info.cross_hole_style, bridge_info.direction, bridge_info.end_miles, bridge_info.flyover_category, bridge_info.hole_length, bridge_info.id, bridge_info.is_delete, bridge_info.line_id, bridge_info.long_chain, bridge_info.middle_miles, bridge_info.operator, bridge_info.remark, bridge_info.side, bridge_info.start_miles, bridge_info.status, bridge_info.track_division_id, bridge_info.track_weigth, bridge_info.update_time form bridge_info
bridge_info.id = #{id}
